plot: Piss Hat is a bittersweet film about a party girl who, unable to reform her reputation, decides to burn some bridges instead.
title: Piss Hat
plot_es: Piss Hat is a bittersweet film about a party girl who, unable to reform her reputation, decides to burn some bridges instead.
plot_en: Piss Hat is a bittersweet film about a party girl who, unable to reform her reputation, decides to burn some bridges instead.
